Text.Page:
While chasing Mihog, learned that the demokrons actually were Parthians, who were transformed after cruel experiments.
Enraged, the Khirian commander Rhodos swore revenge.
(This barrel is too neat compared to the dusty barrels around. And someone seems to have moved it recently.)<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>Move the barrel</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Archdevan sorcerer? She ran right past me, with Zolyn and the popori right behind her!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Okay, thanks."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Zolyn went after her. If you hurry, you can catch up to her and kill that damned archdeva!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What about Rhodos?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
I'll talk to Rhodos...calm him down. You worry about the archdevan sorcerer!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Consider it done!"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
This overcautious buffoon suspected a trap and wouldn't let me get by! Now we've lost the archdevan sorcerer's trail.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Donâ€™t blame him too much."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
